featured_paragraph_1: Ysabel offers the best cakes and sweets for you.
featured_paragraph_2: Ysabel offers the Fresh & Natural Drinks for you.
featured_paragraph_3: For Your Birthday. For Your Special Occasion. For Your Special Day.
about_title1: PROVIDING QUALITY BAKED GOODS FOR ALL CUSTOMERS
about_paragraph1: Isabelle is the product of many talents, starting with the oriental design inspired by the Sarout Mountains and our authentic Arab roots, ending with culinary arts paintings by a professional chef team....Our products are presented in our lofty spirit full of happiness to serve you..... Isabelle's experience is completed with a distinctive view of the city of Abha...
about_title2: ENSURING THE BEST ATMOSPHERE FOR EVERYONE
about_paragraph2: We see the most important part of our business in ensuring the happiness of our staff and the satisfaction of our clients by creating a welcoming and caring atmosphere.
